issue.title: Arrow is unable to reuse Memory chunk in the Pool.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-994](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-994). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See the Attachment ( MemoryLeakTest.java), it just want to test whether Arrow can reuse memory chunk in the Pool or not. However, it didn't all the time. So, I think there is a serious glitch in Arrow 0.3.0( also in 0.1.0, related bug: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-855).
